website_summaries.verdict: This laptop is as powerful as it is portable, making it a must-have for productive frequent travelers.
pros: Folds between laptop, tent, stand, and tablet modes
cons: Being just shy of a true 4K resolution is a minor nitpick

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst laptop I ever bought. I bought it in September, we are in November and already not working. It's been three hours trying to turn in on without success. I call Amazon support who referred me to a Dell support just to tell me I have to pay at least 110 dollars a year to get the support I need. It's my first dell laptop and my last.. do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE: 01/29/2019  This is a total piece of crap.
customer_reviews.text: I have spent the entire 2 weeks I've had this trying to get the cursor to stop bouncing around the screen. I finally had to send it back to Dell where they replaced the hard drive and a 'mechanical part'. This was after on the phone with tech support who finally had to give up trying to find a fix. (I must say that the tech support was EXCELLENT especially given how mad I was.) I don't know if this was a one off or was related to the third party supplier. In any event, it seems ok now but I will never buy a Dell again.
customer_reviews.author: reviewer22203

customer_reviews.title: This laptop lasted 2 weeks. A fatal error message ...
customer_reviews.text: This laptop lasted 2 weeks. A fatal error message appeared that I couldn't get past, so I sent it back. No hassle return and they did refund my money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Dell HD
customer_reviews.text: This computer was purchased in July 2018. It stopped booting. Sent it to Dell for repair. Doesn't contain Dell hard drive, so is not under warranty. We have to pay to repair!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip H Smallwood

customer_reviews.title: Hard Drive crashed after 7 days of usage.
customer_reviews.text: Just installed few basic software and after 2 days it started getting stuck and then it crashed today.
customer_reviews.author: harsha

customer_reviews.title: Lemon
customer_reviews.text: It was a lemon from day one. The screen flickered, it was extremely slow, and the fan continued to run.
customer_reviews.author: KathleenO724

customer_reviews.title: Noisy, Heavy and Slow, but delivering what I bought it for,
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of the screen, and that it is a sturdy laptop. I bought it for its conversion capabilities, the quality and size of the screen, and the storage capacity. For this price, and with these requirements, I don't think there is a better lap top. However, it is heavy, it is noisy and it is slow.
customer_reviews.author: Bethesda Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I’m so regret I didn’t return it in time!
customer_reviews.text: I need restart it multiple times a day, and I did all the updates available.
customer_reviews.author: Valeria Diniz Franco

customer_reviews.title: Quality for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Has a good solid feel. The Solid State Drive is fast. Love the touch screen tablet mode. It has a lighted keyboard and that is one of my favorite features. Bright clear display. I wish it had a standard ethernet port but I guess that is the way laptops are being built now.
customer_reviews.author: W. B. Fay

customer_reviews.title: Crashed twice within two months
customer_reviews.text: I read tons of reviews and picked cautiously. My husband has the bigger version of this laptop and we have had no issues with it for years so I felt good about buying this one. It crashed twice in two months. The first time it was recoverable and the second time I lost everything. I’m in school for my master’s degree and I lost all of that work. Pictures of my child. Save yourself the headache and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: kit_kat

customer_reviews.title: Slows to a crawl
customer_reviews.text: If you like computing at a snail's pace, this is the computer for you. It's slow to start, even from sleep mode. After it gets through grinding through it's startup routines, it will be marginal until you open too many windows in the browser. Then it gets into its snail mode and you have to close all windows (if it doesn't freeze up totally) and restart. I've tried four different browsers, so it isn't the browser, it's the computer. I have a Sony with almost the same configuration and it doesn't have this problem. I think this is my last Dell computer.
customer_reviews.author: Levade

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - WARRANTY EXPIRED UPON PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Whatever you do, DO NOT BUY FROM THIS SELLER! The Warranty Expired one month after purchasing. Dell shows the original purchase date was MARCH 25, 2018 and I purchased it in MARCH OF 2019. Thanks for ripping me off!
customer_reviews.author: AppleSauce365

customer_reviews.title: BEST COMPUTER EVER!
customer_reviews.text: It is far and away the best computer I have ever had. It's been a learning curve as I find more features that I love. I wish we had bought this one earlier in the year when we bought a cheaper one.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Pritchett

customer_reviews.title: A perfectly good laptop once you remedy the two main issues
customer_reviews.text: I had the phantom touch issue that I've seen described with dell touch screen device. It seems to work normally for a finite length of time, before "clicking" on the same spot continuously, rendering it unusable. I was looking at replacement screens for a while, as I've operated on many a laptop in the past. I finally realized the touchscreen can be disabled in windows 10 device manager. I also replaced the hdd with a Samsung ssd, and the difference with Intel 9th gen cpu is extremely noticeable. Its currently in my living room as ah htpc
customer_reviews.author: ckt

customer_reviews.title: Fast start up
customer_reviews.text: I have not had it long enough to really evaluate it. So far I'm impressed with it's speed. It is my first experience with a touch screen and like the way it speeds my usage of it, much quicker than a mouse. The more I use it, the better I like it but I have yet so much to learn of it's capabilities and features--learn something new each day.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: DOA - AND WRONG PRODUCT - CANT GET MUCH WORSE
customer_reviews.text: This laptop was not the model shown. It was not a convertible laptop 2 in 1. But that’s not even the worst part. It wouldn’t even power on with the charger plugged in. The charger was working because the LED indicator light was illuminated, but the LED on the laptop didn’t. I used several different outlets and tried EVERYTHING. nothing worked. Super bummed. I don’t know who’s to blame here but needless to say, I returned it and bought another. From a different seller and a different brand. DO NOT RISK IT!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: The Limbirds

customer_reviews.title: Performs good as 2-in-1 laptop function & has a decent battery life ,but has some defects like these
customer_reviews.text: 1- low quality finish materials ( recycled plastic ) that I think won't resist harsh daily conditions for a long time . 2- emitting excess heat from vent outlets to your body doesn't keep you in comfort with using it for a long . 3- May be a little big and heavy when using as a tablet 4- webcam does not perform as 720p HD webcam it has a poor quality . Note: purchased from seller : Starlake Electronics
customer_reviews.author: A.Adel

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Works great like a Dell product should but I do wish I had gotten the stylus with it my fat arthritis infested fingers don't work as good.
customer_reviews.author: Mat

customer_reviews.title: It keeps popping open files that I don't click on, then it shuts down
customer_reviews.text: This computer is a pain, it was not well made and it has a lot of flaws. First, it will open programs and run files while I'm in the middle of working. This then causes the mouse to TURN OFF AND TOUCH TO TURN OFF, leaving me stuck and unable to complete actions for no reason. I can't FACTORY RESET, ITS BROKEN. And finally the TOUCH SCREEN DOES NOT WORK IN THE MIDDLE OF THE SCREEN! This is a bad computer, I do not recommend it for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Too long to boot
customer_reviews.text: It's a solid 8 minutes to boot or come out of hibernation. Nothing except Google chrome installed. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Radio Guy

customer_reviews.title: Not a good option.
customer_reviews.text: Hangs alot. Slow startup. Takes time to switch between application.
customer_reviews.author: Ankur

customer_reviews.title: This computer was NOT new.
customer_reviews.text: This computer was sold as "new", but when it broke 4 months later, we found out the warranty had expired and the computer was, in fact, 2 years old. They did not disclose that the manufacturers warranty would expire 2 weeks after our purchase. The hard drive had to be completely replaced. DO NOT BUY A COMPUTER FROM HERE!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was sold a used computer
customer_reviews.text: This computer was supposed to be new but when went to have is serviced at dell they told me is was old and used
customer_reviews.author: mniiller

customer_reviews.title: Does not wake up when I touch the key board or a mouse pad
customer_reviews.text: Does not wake up when I touch the key board or a mouse pad. Had to return it. DEll people could not fix the problem. Other then that it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Astra

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Hard drive died in less than 1 year!!!!! If it wasn't for saving my files externally, I would have lost 4 years of medical school notes/files....my life. No warning, just dead. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabet L.

customer_reviews.title: Ease of Use
customer_reviews.text: Simple for project staff to become familiar with and begin using...
customer_reviews.author: dangeorge

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Good product , works very nice . No problems at all
customer_reviews.author: HealthGuru

customer_reviews.title: Very fast laptop
customer_reviews.text: I love this laptop. Have had it now for 5 months and still works like new.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great computer. Smooth. Lots of nice features. Great for people that draw.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with Windows Pro
customer_reviews.text: In the questions it said it came with Windows Pro - It does not!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle G.

customer_reviews.title: Great investment! Dell Inspiron 2 in 1
customer_reviews.text: Dell Inspiron 2 in 1 is a great computer. For the price you really can't beat it. Beautiful display, has some weight. Don't expect a light computer. Quality made, not cheap looking. Aluminum grey look, which I'm not a fan of. It will show eventually wear. Fast start up. It's big in tablet mode.
customer_reviews.author: Al Williams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super fast computer... even the WiFi is 3 times as fast as my previous laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Nice laptop
customer_reviews.text: My husband says, so far so good. He's enjoying it, but he says it hasn't been put to the test yet.
customer_reviews.author: Harlem Girl

customer_reviews.title: As described.
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast, just as described. Will buy from seller again! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hull

customer_reviews.title: Superb machine
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter, but it's a thousand times better than mine lol. Very clear images, fast computer. I may end up getting another one
customer_reviews.author: Prof. Shelby
